pageDescriptions.dashboard: Welcome to your dashboard. Here you can manage your account and view your activity.
pageDescriptions.settings: Customize your application settings and preferences.
pageDescriptions.appearance: Change the look and feel of the application by selecting your preferred theme.
pageDescriptions.language: Select your preferred language for the application interface.
pageDescriptions.applications: View and manage your applications for events.
pageDescriptions.profile: Manage your personal information and profile settings.
pageDescriptions.personalInfo: Manage your basic personal information and profile details.
pageDescriptions.contactDetails: Manage your contact information and communication preferences.
pageDescriptions.address: Manage your mailing and residence address information.
pageDescriptions.education: Manage your education and academic information.
pageDescriptions.preferences: Customize your application preferences and settings.
pageDescriptions.teamerInfo: Manage your teamer-specific information and details.
pageDescriptions.currentEvents: View events that are currently active.
pageDescriptions.pastEvents: View events that have already taken place.
pageDescriptions.currentApplications: View and manage your active applications.

auth.email_sent: We've sent you a link to reset your password.
auth.password_updated: Your password has been updated successfully.
auth.sign_up_success: Success! Check your email for a link to confirm your account.
